name: Leantime
description: Leantime is a project management app that helps non-project managers at both enterprises and SMBs to easily connect strategy to their day-to-day execution while maintaining employee engagement through the use of behavioral science, motivational psychology
one_liner: Leantime is a project management app that helps non-project managers at both enterprises and SMBs to easily connect strategy to their day-to-day execution while maintaining employee engagement through the use of behavioral science, motivational psychology
